form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Cruz (for himself, Mr. Risch, Mr. Lee, Mr. Tuberville, Mr. Budd, and Mr. Cornyn) introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Homeland Security and Governmental Affairs

form.official-title: To repeal the Comprehensive Policing and Justice Reform Amendment Act of 2022 enacted by the District of Columbia Council.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Common-Sense Law Enforcement and Accountability Now in DC Act or the CLEAN DC Act.

section.header: Repeal of Comprehensive Policing and Justice Reform Amendment Act of 2022
section.text: The Comprehensive Policing and Justice Reform Amendment Act of 2022 (D.C. Law 24â€“345) is repealed, and any provision of law amended or repealed by that Act shall be restored or revived as if that Act had not been enacted into law.
